about_the_game:
OVERVIEW:

Enter the twisted world of a nightmare where forbidden horrors lurk in the shadows and forgotten gods stir beneath the surface. In this Roguelite Boomer Shooter, heavily inspired by the 90s shooter like Blood, you play as Lucian Cross, a scarred mercenary bound to a powerful demon. Fueled by revenge, you descend into the ever-shifting Bloodstone Labyrinth, battling the forces of the Cult of Shadows to stop the resurrection of a forgotten god. 

Blending the visceral thrill of 90s boomer shooters with the depth of modern roguelikes, this game offers intense firefights, random dungeon layouts, and an escalating difficulty that keeps players on their toes. As Lucian, you'll wield an array of supernatural firearms, use powerful upgrades, and navigate the labyrinth’s trap-laden corridors while balancing exploration with survival.

Wishlist now and be the first to join the adventure into the Bloodstone Labyrinth!!!

KEY FEATURES:

  • Fast-Paced Boomer Shooter Combat: Inspired by 90s classics like Blood with strafing, quick movement, and deadly accuracy.

  • Dynamic Power-Ups and Builds: Collect soul fragments and build your character through passive and active upgrades to suit your playstyle.

  • Procedurally Generated Dungeons: Each run is unique with random room layouts, traps, and secrets to discover.

  • Challenging Boss Fights: Face off against powerful bosses at the end of each level, each with multi-phase fights that require skill and strategy.

Prepare to descend into the darkness, where every choice could be your last.

name: Hexborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 380 (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super or AMD Radeon RX 590 (DirectX 12 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card with latest drivers

short_description: A fast-paced roguelite boomer shooter inspired by 90s classics, where you battle cultists and eldritch horrors in procedurally generated dungeons. Wield supernatural firearms, collect powerful upgrades, and survive escalating challenges in a fight against a forgotten god.
